name: GRAPHQL SERVER
overview: GraphQL/Prisma server that allows this portfolio site to perform CRUD operation. Jest for testing.
objective: Enable basic CRUD operation so this portfolio site can create, read, update, and delete projects as well as testimonials. Require authentication in order to perform CRUD operation except reading.

name: PORTFOLIO SITE
overview: Portfolio site as well as playground where I practice what I've learned.
objective: Build a react application that is maintainable and scalable. Use "useContext" and "useReducer" for state management. Create design system using Emotion and Storybook

name: STORYBOOK
objective: Build design system to develop reuseable and scalable components.

name: GITHUB FINDER
overview: To search for github users and their public repositories. React Hooks are used for state management
objective: To implement React Hooks such as useState, useEffect, useContext and useReducer. Consider when to use Redux or Hooks for state management. Practice how to keep information such as API keys safe.

name: Q&A REST API
overview: REST API for Q&A sites. Handles post/delete questions, answer questions, vote/edit answers.
objective: Build REST API using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB and Mongoose. Practice creating schema and Model, handling errors, and providing proper data and status code.
